column1: Verify that the usage of apps installed from Marketplace can be tracked
Verify that the usage of apps installed from Marketplace can be tracked
Verify that 2G data usage can be tracked
Verify that 2G data usage can be tracked
Verify that invalid limit values can't be set in MB format
Verify that invalid limit values can't be set in GB format
[Sys FE] Per-app mobile usage addes up to the total mobile usage
[Sys FE] Per-app mobile usage addes up to the total mobile usage
[Sys FE] Mobile data usage is tracked on a per app basis
[Sys FE] Mobile data usage is tracked on a per app basis
[Cost Control][Usage app]Launching Usage without a SIM should display appropriate message
[Cost Control] Verify there is no text overlap on the Data Report page in the Portuguese Language
Verify the format of the graph is correct for weekly billing period
Verify the format of the graph is correct for monthly billing period
Verify the format of the graph is correct for never billing period
Verify that users (SIM Card without billing support)can decide to see the 3G and Wifi data used
Verify that users SIM Card (without billing support) can decide to see the WiFi data used
Verify that when a 3G data is below amount of alert, it maintains a color that is reflected also in the Data Module in Notification Center.
Press limit button, access to the input limit screen and verify that the keyboard contains the keys defined by UX team
Press limit button, input the limit of data usage and press done button
Limit button, access to the input limit screen and press cancel button
Configure the limit in GB format
Configure the limit in MB format
Press limit button and verify that the user access the limit configuration mode
Verify that the user is able to open the Settings screen in the Cost Control app.
Verify that the user can enable data use alerts in the Cost Control app.
Verify when the data usage cycle is reseted (based on user configuration), the counters are reseted too and any alert are dismissed.
Verify that when the limit is reached, the data module of the utility tray changes its background colour to the limit-background colour (red).
Verify when user SIM Card (without billing support)reaches 80% of the alert, the data module in the utility tray it will change its background color to the alert-background color. (orange)
Verify that tapping in the credit module, in the notification bar, opens the Detailed Telephony App View.
Verify in the notification bar the user has information about calls made for the user's postpaid subscription.
Verify the functionality of selecting the starting day of a monthly tracking cycle but do no change it
Start day selection for Weekly billing period, Go back with no changes. Postpaid users SIM Card with billing support.
Verify postpaid users (SIM Card with billing support) can switching between Monthly, Weekly and Never billing periods and going back without changes
Verify that the data usage counter is reset after the end of a Monthly billing period.
Verify that the data usage counter resets after the end of a Weekly billing period.
Verify the low balance threshold can be turned off.
Verify that low balance threshold by default is on
Verify a message displays when the threshold is set to 0.
Verify the done button is disabled if threshold is empty.
Verify the user can edit low balance warning threshold.
Verify when an already configured SIM card (without billing support) is inserted data from the older card used is recovered.
Verify that data usage counter does not reset when Never" billing period is selected"
Verify the format of the graphic showing data consumption displays correctly.
Verify that for users when limit is set data module shows a bar with current data used and the value of the limit set
Verify that a notification appears in notification tray when 3G data usage surpass the limit set
For users, no limits configured in data usage application, check that 3G data used, and timestamp for last 3G connection are both correct.
Verify that for users when limit is set data module shows a bar with current data used and the value of the limit set.
Verify that for users, when limit is set, the data module shows a bar with current data used and the value of the set limit.
Verify that users, tapping in the data module, data usage view is opened in Cost Control app.
Verify changing the date to a future date inside a monthly period is handled correctly regarding SMS count, for postpaid users
Verify when using a 3G data connection, the amount of data used is shown in the 3G data usage module.
Verify when using a 3G data connection, the amount of data used is shown in the data usage details view.
Verify when using a Wifi connection, the amount of data used is shown in the data usage details view.
Verify that when using a new SIM (not configured yet) after having used another one, data consumption records are not mixed
Verify that users can reset the 3G data usage counters ( SIM card without billing support).
Verify that when a previously configured SIM card is inserted, that 3G usage data is recovered and correctly displayed. SIM without billing support.
Verify that 3G consumption data is recovered if a previously configured SIM is inserted after data is reset on another postpaid SIM. SIM without billing support
Verify that users can reset the 3G data usage counters, and that the Cancel button on confirmation screen if functional. (SIM card without billing support)
Verify that when a user resets the 3G usage data, then the last data available is shown. SIM without billing support.
Verify if a users reset the 3G data consumption data, 3G data usage will be set to 0. SIM without billing support.
Verify the settings available for users in cost control application are correct.
Verify that when an already configured SIM is inserted, then limit is recovered (if set) and alarms are shown. (if aplicable)
Verify when a not yet configured SIM card is inserted, no limit is set.
Verify the format of the graph is correct for monthly billing period
Verify the format of the graph is correct for never billing period
